title: Accounting Fundamentals Mastery Program Using Integrated Instructional Materials

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational math and business terminology comprehension
context.additional_context: Application of Text-Diagram Integrated Materials for Understanding Accounting Concepts in Real-Time Video Classes Using Personal Devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can perform simple transaction journal entries with over 80% accuracy by applying double-entry accounting principles
Learners can connect visual diagrams and textual explanations to components of financial statements (income statements, balance sheets)
Learners can sequence accounting cycle stages and explain key deliverables for each phase
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
